Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur Prolactin Master Curve Material (MCM)
ADVIA Centaur Cortisol Master Curve Material (MCM)
ADVIA Centaur PRL Master Curve Material
ADVIA Centaur COR Master Curve Material
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens ADVIA Centaur Prolactin and Cortisol Master Curve Materials as quality control calibrators for verification of calibration and reportable range on ADVIA Centaur assays
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the verification of calibration and reportable range of the ADVIA Centaur Prolactin or Cortisol assay
